author: Pat McGrath
title: Insurance giant moves to exclude people who die from COVID-19, leaked policy reveals
description: One of Australia's biggest life insurers moves to cut off payouts to customers who die from COVID-19, including frontline doctors fighting the deadly virus.
content:
Posted 
March 27, 2020 05:57:09
One of Australia's biggest life insurers has moved to cut off payouts to customers who die from COVID-19, including frontline doctors fighting the deadly virus.
